did.abstract: John M. Wright was the editor of the San Fernando Valley Times. The collection consists of letters to him from various political figures such as Earl Warren, Fletcher Bowron, Goodwin Knight, Richard M. Nixon, James Forrestal, and others concerning the paper's support in campaigns and elections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of letters to Wright as editor of the San Fernando Valley Times from Earl Warren, Fletcher Bowron, Goodwin Knight, Richard M. Nixon, James Forrestal, and others chiefly concerning political support by the Valley Times in campaigns and elections. Also includes letters of condolence on his death to Thelma Wright, a few clippings, photographs, and related ephemeral material.
